dmca.title: [ThePlanetAbuse-C4352688L] Website Name Copyright Infringement
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern: Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not substantially comply with the required notification elements of the Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA"). Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your claim. Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/about_us/legal_docs/ThePlanet%20Copyright%20Infringeme nt%2001%2015%2007%20FINAL.pdf Legal Response Team THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC. -----Original Message----- From: abuse@theplanet.com [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] Sent: Thursday, May 31, 2007 2:06 PM To: Copyright Subject: [ThePlanetAbuse-C4352688L] Website Name Copyright Infringement ==== Forwarded Ticket ==== 1. Website Name Copyright Infringement Added by system at Thursday, May 31 2007 07:05 pm X-MailFrom: ssmall@accolo.com X-RcptTo: abacus@abacus.ev1servers.net Received: from [216.12.192.67] by [216.12.192.78] (abacus) for ; Thu May 31 19:05:30 2007 Received: (qmail 15172 invoked by alias); 1 Jun 2007 00:05:30 -0000 Delivered-To: abuse@inbound.abacus.ev1servers.net Received: (qmail 15157 invoked from network); 1 Jun 2007 00:05:28 -0000 Received: from spooling.theplanet.com (69.56.141.4) by inbound.abacus.ev1servers.net with SMTP; 1 Jun 2007 00:05:28 -0000 Return-path: Delivery-date: Thu, 31 May 2007 19:05:28 -0500 Received: from [172.16.220.10] (helo=DALD2EXCH01.PLANET.LOCAL) by spooling.theplanet.com (envelope-from ssmall@accolo.com) with esmtp (Exim) id 1Htudz-0004TC-Pl for abuse@inbound.abacus.ev1servers.net; Thu, 31 May 2007 19:05:28 -0500 Received: from Exchanger.ev1servers.net ([207.218.222.102]) by DALD2EXCH01.PLANET.LOCAL with Microsoft SMTPSVC(6.0.3790.1830); Thu, 31 May 2007 19:04:53 -0500 Received: from mailin.ev1servers.net ([207.218.222.124]) by Exchanger.ev1servers.net with Microsoft SMTPSVC(6.0.3790.1830); Thu, 31 May 2007 19:04:52 -0500 X-ASG-Debug-ID: 1180656286-20717-110-0 X-Barracuda-URL: http://207.218.222.124:8000/cgi-bin/mark.cgi X-ASG-Recipient-Whitelist: abuse@ev1servers.net Received: from outbound.MSE7.exchange.ms (outbound.mse7.exchange.ms [69.25.50.185]) by mailin.ev1servers.net (Spam Firewall) with ESMTP id B098488526 for ; Thu, 31 May 2007 19:04:51 -0500 (CDT) X-MimeOLE: Produced By Microsoft Exchange V6.5 Content-class: urn:content-classes:message Return-Receipt-To: "Susan Small" MIME-Version: 1.0 Content-Type: multipart/mixed; boundary="----_=_NextPart_001_01C7A3E0.70A32FF7" Disposition-Notification-To: "Susan Small" X-ASG-Orig-Subj: Website Name Copyright Infringement Subject: Website Name Copyright Infringement Date: Thu, 31 May 2007 20:04:36 -0400 Message-ID: X-MS-Has-Attach: yes X-MS-TNEF-Correlator: Thread-Topic: Website Name Copyright Infringement Thread-Index: AcdyYF1bTXDSEAPIRHCYklEgKUfnUQxfkpCg From: "Susan Small" To: , X-Virus-Scanned: by Barracuda Spam Firewall at ev1servers.net X-Barracuda-Spam-Score: 0.00 X-Barracuda-Spam-Status: No, SCORE=0.00 using global scores of TAG_LEVEL=4.0 QUARANTINE_LEVEL=1000.0 KILL_LEVEL=8.0 WHITELISTED X-OriginalArrivalTime: 01 Jun 2007 00:04:52.0096 (UTC) FILETIME=[7A2A9000:01C7A3E0] (multipart/mixed) Multipart prefix (text/plain) This is a multi-part message in MIME format. (multipart/alternative) MIME element (text/plain) Greetings: I need to speak with someone at your office regarding the copyright infringement of our company name on a website you are hosting, www.acollo.com . We have tried to contact the website owner directly, but have met with many obstacles. We are turning to you in good faith as the ISP for this website and respectfully request that you take down this site based on infringement of the ICANN policy - attached. Please feel free to contact me by email or phone to discuss this matter. Kind regards, _________________________________________ Susan Small Office Manager & Executive Assistant Accolo, Inc. ssmall@accolo.com P: 415-755-1220 F: 415-785-7834 www.accolo.com MIME element (text/html)

Greetings:  ; I need to speak with someone at your office regarding the copyright infringement of our company name on a website you are hosting, www.acollo.com.

 

We have tried to contact the website owner directly, but have met with many obstacles.  We are turning to you in good faith as the ISP for this website and respectfully request that you take down this site based on infringement of the ICANN policy – attached.

 

Please feel free to contact me by email or phone to discuss this matter.

 

Kind regards,

 

____________________________________ _____

Susan Small

Office Manager & Executive Assistant

Accolo, Inc.

ssmall@accolo.com

P: 415-755-1220

F: 415-785-7834

www.accolo.com
